'''Rían''' was, according to "[[The Heirs of Elendil]]", the daughter of the Steward [[Barahir (Steward of Gondor)|Barahir]] of [[Gondor]]. After her brother [[Dior (Steward of Gondor)|Dior]] died childless, her son [[Denethor I]] became the tenth [[Ruling Steward]].<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 204</ref> In "[[The Tale of Years of the Third Age]]" Denethor I is told to be Dior's son.<ref>[[PM|Years]], p. 235, 249.</ref>

Rían was probably named after the daughter of [[Belegund]] of the [[House of Bëor]] of the [[First Age]].
